extension.name: Real Estate Manager Location Map Free
extension.author: Andrey Kvasnevskiy-OrdaSoft(akbet@mail.ru)
extension.description: Location Map module for Real estate manager component. You can add markers of your estates on the map . You can then load these modules in your content pages using {loadposition position}.

field.name: is_percentage
field.label: Width of map Pixels or 100%
field.description: Select map width and height in pixels or percentage

field.name: map_width
field.label: Width of map (px)
field.description: The width of your location map (in px)

field.name: map_height
field.label: Height of map (px)
field.description: The height of your location map (in px)

field.name: new_target
field.label: Open estate in new tab
field.description: Show estate in new tab when user click on the marker

field.name: estates
field.label: Count of estates
field.description: Count of estates. Zero means do not display estates

field.name: cat_id
field.label: IDs of categories
field.description: Input IDs of categories through a comma to show all estates of this categories. Leave the field empty if you want to show estates of all categories. Caution! Do not input IDs of estates and categories together!

field.name: estate_id
field.label: IDs of estates
field.description: Input IDs of estates through a comma. Leave the field empty if you want to show all estates. Caution! Do not input IDs of estates and categories together!

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: Suffix for the css class of the module, to allow individual module styling

field.name: ItemId
field.label: ItemId
field.description: Enter Id for Menu Item realestatemanger
